sentence.Network_en: A ratchet mechanism transfers the thread from spool to bobbin.
sentence.Network_cn: 一种棘齿装置把线从线轴转到梭心上。

sentence.Network_en: Wire gages were produced with both flat - grid and bobbin - type constructions.
sentence.Network_cn: 制造金属丝应变片可采取平格栅型和线管型两种结构.

sentence.Network_en: Andrew was determined to become something better than a bobbin boy.
sentence.Network_cn: 安德鲁决心要找一个比绕线工好一点的工作.

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 16th cent.: from French bobine, of unknown origin

entry.def: A bobbin is a small round object on which thread or wool is wound to hold it, for example on a sewing machine.

means.word_mean: 1. a winder around which thread or tape or film or other flexible materials can be wound

auth_sentence.content: Bogdan followed her, feigning interest, past painted wooden eggs and sallow bobbin-lace, his chest reverberating with sorrow.
